response.original_title: Envy: Last Wish - Live at Liquid Room Tokyo
response.overview: Envy played only one show after the worldwide release of their critically acclaimed new album, The Fallen Crimson. In February 2020 – before COVID-19 effectively halted all live music worldwide, Envy performed a crazy, sweaty, sold-out hometown show at LIQUIDROOM, the Tokyo venue that has become sort of an extended living room for the legendary band. “We were lucky that we were able to play this one gig before all live shows were canceled“, says vocalist Testu Fukagawa. “The performance itself is a bit rough and we could probably have performed better, but we wanted to send our fresh feelings to our fans by means of this performance, while they can't see Envy live.”
response.tagline: Envy played only one show after the worldwide release of their critically acclaimed new album, The Fallen Crimson.
response.title: Envy: Last Wish - Live at Liquid Room Tokyo
